about_the_game:
WASD in the West

WASD in the West is a challenging roguelike game where you will have to press the buttons that appear as quickly as possible to defeat your enemy and it will be the key to survival. You can also stop by the store to resupply so you can survive the following dangers.

Jose the Gecko

José, a yellow gecko with great cunning and speed, is a feared bounty hunter in the Wild West. His ability to track and capture criminals has made him a legend in the region. With his golden scale shining in the sun, he chases the most dangerous outlaws without anyone managing to escape him.
detailed_description:
WASD in the West

WASD in the West is a challenging roguelike game where you will have to press the buttons that appear as quickly as possible to defeat your enemy and it will be the key to survival. You can also stop by the store to resupply so you can survive the following dangers.

Jose the Gecko

José, a yellow gecko with great cunning and speed, is a feared bounty hunter in the Wild West. His ability to track and capture criminals has made him a legend in the region. With his golden scale shining in the sun, he chases the most dangerous outlaws without anyone managing to escape him.
name: WASD in the West

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700K / AMD r5 3600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 Super / RX 5700 XT (8GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: WASD in the West is a roguelike where your reflexes and mind are essential. Join José, a bounty-hunting gecko, in a wild world full of dangers and rewards. Do you dare to face it?
